title: Jennifer Garner steps out for the first time since her ex Ben Affleck had a sobriety setback
text:
Jennifer Garner stepped out Monday, seen for the first time since ex-husband Ben Affleck sobriety slip after a Halloween party.

The 47-year-old actress looked slightly worried while was out with a friend in LA.

Shortly after Affleck's drunken display leaving a masquerade Halloween party Saturday, he was seen going to Garner's home in Pasadena, California, where he acknowledged his slip-up.

Jen heads out: Just days after he ex-husband Ben Affleck was seen clearly inebriated after leaving a Halloween party on Saturday night, his ex-wife Jennifer Garner was seen stepping out for the first time since her ex's setback

Garner was wearing a white sweater with black stripes and dark blue jeans for her Monday afternoon outing.

She also donned white running shoes and a black watch with her hair tied back.

The actress completed her look with a large black bag that she had dangling from her shoulder.

Garner's look: Garner was wearing a white sweater with black stripes and dark blue jeans for her Monday afternoon outing

Garner hasn't publicly addressed her ex Ben Affleck's sobriety slip-up, but Affleck spoke about it just before arriving to Garner's house Sunday in video obtained by Daily Mail.

'Well you know it happens, it’s a slip but I’m not going to let it derail me,' Affleck said before arriving at Garner's house in Pasadena.

When asked if he was heading back to rehab, Affleck wouldn't answer as he headed to his ex's home.

Ben speaks: Garner hasn't publicly spoken about her ex Ben Affleck's sobriety slip-up, but Affleck spoke about it just before arriving to Garner's house Sunday in video obtained by Daily Mail

Garner has been supportive of Affleck's struggles to get sober in the past, and they are often seen together as they continue to co-parent their children, Violet, 13, Seraphina, 10, and Samuel, 7.

Garner and Affleck first met on films Pearl Harbor and Daredevil and were married in 2015 before they announced their split in 2015, with the divorce finalized in 2018.

Affleck has been dating on and off since the split, with model Shauna Sexton, Saturday Night Live producer Lindsay Shookus and most recently musician Katie Cherry, who Affleck was seen with at the masquerade party.

New fling: Affleck has been dating on and off since the split, with model Shauna Sexton, Saturday Night Live producer Lindsay Shookus and most recently musician Katie Cherry, who Affleck was seen with at the masquerade party

Since her split from Affleck, Garner has been dating businessman John Miller for nearly a year.

There had been rumors that Garner and Miller were heading towards an engagement, but that has not happened yet.

Garner will next be seen in Yes Day, a comedy about two parents (Garner and Edgar Ramirez) who try to make it through an entire day where they have to say 'yes' to everything their children ask for.
description: Jennifer Garner stepped out  Monday, seen for the first time since ex-husband Ben Affleck was seen clearly inebriated after leaving a Halloween party.
